mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_thanks (nick_name, username, money, info, email, state, pay_type, order_id, created, updated) values (#{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_thanks set nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, nick_name, username, money, info, email, state, pay_type, order_id, created, updated from tb_thanks where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, nick_name, username, money, info, email, state, pay_type, order_id, created, updated from tb_thanks
